sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Typography, Card, CardContent, Grid } from '@mui/material'; const UserDetails = () => { const { username } = useParams(); const [user, setUser] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch(`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setUser(data)); }, [username]); if (!user) return Loading...; return ( User Details {user.login} Name: {user.name} Company: {user.company} Followers: {user.followers} Following: {user.following} Public Repositories: {user.public_repos} ); }; export default UserDetails;
